import React from 'react' import BtnLink from "../../../Layouts/BtnLink/BtnLink" import Btn from "../../../Layouts/Btn/Btn" import styles from './Tariffs.module.scss' const Tariffs = () => { const tariffList = [ { logo: , speed: '100', speedUnit: 'мбит/с', router: 'Роутер: +10 руб./мес.', chanel: '139 каналов ТВ', minutes: '1200 минут и 500 SMS', internet: 'Безлимитный интернет', aboutLink: '/', discount: '50', discountPeriod: 'Первые полгода скидка', costWithDiscount: '200', costCurrency: 'Р', costWithoutDiscount: '400', } ] let conditions = { router: , chanel: , minutes: , internet: } return (
{ tariffList.map((item, index) =>
{ item.logo }
{ item.speed } { item.speedUnit }
{ conditions.map((conditionsItem, index) => item[ conditionsItem ] ?
{ conditionsItem } { item[ conditionsItem ] }
: null ) }
{ item.discount ?
{ item.discountPeriod } { item.discount }%
: null }
{ item.costWithDiscount }{ item.costCurrency } { item.costWithoutDiscount ?
{ item.costWithoutDiscount }{ item.costCurrency }
: null }
) }
) } export default Tariffs
